channel.title: CVE Feed for JetBrains -- YouTrack
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JetBrains -- YouTrack

item.title: CVE-2024-48902|2024-10-10T13:44:30.364Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.3.46677 improper access control allowed users with project update permission to delete applications via API

item.title: CVE-2024-47160|2024-09-19T18:01:00.797Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.3.44799 access to global app config data without appropriate permissions was possible

item.title: CVE-2024-47162|2024-09-19T17:58:06.239Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.3.44799 token could be revealed on Imports page

item.title: CVE-2024-47159|2024-09-19T18:01:19.913Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.3.44799 user without appropriate permissions could restore workflows attached to a project

item.title: CVE-2024-38504|2024-08-02T04:12:25.213Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.2.34646 the Guest User Account was enabled for attaching files to articles
